messages.message: hi team, can someone update this guide around adding new external users to instabase.com (http://instabase.com)? https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IB/pages/956465261/How+to+create+an+Instabase.com+account cc @Heymian

Hey @Charlie Cohen — adding external users to instabase.com (http://instabase.com) is not a supported pattern for us. We don’t provide many reliability guarantees for instabase.com (http://instabase.com) and so it’s not the best place for external users to use. Curious what we’re trying to do?
seems like there might be a better way to go about this?
usually we can convert certain pages to pdfs as needed, I don’t know if we’d want to give customers unfettered access to instabase.com (http://instabase.com)
understood. so they'll probably be best off using the mirrored docs on their on prem instance
as i have heard PDFs are a non starter
